var ToClipboard=require('./toClipboard');/**
 * Copies the given text and executes done() when finished copying.
 * @param {Object} options 
 * @param {String} options.text
 * @param {Function} options.done
 */export var handyCopy=function handyCopy(options){var defaults={text:'',done:function done(){return;}};var settings=Object.assign({},defaults,options);var text=settings.text;var done=settings.done;ToClipboard(text);done();};
